data.message: I have a page for my business and today the page feed doesn't show up when i press the tab . Please help, thank you.

replies.message:
Hey Barry. Over the next few weeks, we will fully deprecate the ability to login and use Facebook as the Page you manage. Pages will still have all of the same capabilities as before; people will now have to login with their own individual account and then select the Page they manage when posting, commenting on or liking other Pages.
To see a feed of all of the Pages your Page likes, navigate to your Page and select “View Pages Feed” under your Page's profile picture. Hope this does the trick! -Jordan
Jordan can anyone please reply? What's happening?!
clicked on it and its not coming up, this isn't good!
Still not working I clicked on "Pages Feed" and I get nothing!! Please help! Thank you.
